name: .WTCAMP
summary: Learn about .WTCAMP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a WTCAMP file in Wee Tanks! (Windows, Mac). To do so, first place the file in your Documents/​My Games/​Wee Tanks directory. Then, open Wee Tanks! and select Map Editor → Play Campaign. The campaign your CAMPAIGN file contains will appear in the list of custom campaigns.
